DOC.brief_summary: The study purpose compare EDWARDS INTUITY valve system minimal invasive surgical approach ( MIS ) commercially available aortic bioprosthesis standard full ster-notomy surgical approach .
DOC.brief_title: EDWARDS INTUITY Valve System CADENCE-MIS Study
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study compare cross-clamp time ( XCT ) cardiopulmonary bypass time ( CPBT ) EDWARDS INTUITY valve system minimally invasive surgical approach ( MIS ) commercially available aortic bioprosthesis standard full sternotomy surgical approach , patient logistic EuroScore < 20 undergoing elective isolate aortic valve replacement ( AVR ) surgery . Additionally , aim gather sufficient data quantify effect size short term patient benefit outcome previously identify literature explore additional healthcare resource utilization endpoint .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . ≥18 year age 2. aortic stenosis / mixed aortic stenosis aortic insufficiency Log 3 . EuroSCORE < 20 4 . NYHA Class ≤II Exclusion ( i.a . ) : 1. pure aortic insufficiency 2. previous cardiac surgery ( involve FS MIS approach ) 3. congenital true bicuspid / unicuspid aortic valve 4 . LVEF < 25 %
